    ExcludedAncillaries office_son_of_chinglu1, office_son_of_chinglu2
    ExcludeCultures barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, nomad, roman
    Description office_son_of_chinglu3_desc
    EffectsDescription office_son_of_chinglu3_effects_desc
    Effect Command  1 
    Effect TroopMorale  2 
    Effect MovementPoints  2 

;------------------------------------------

    ExcludeCultures barbarian, carthaginian, roman, hun, nomad

;===============================================================
;== ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE ==============================
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_actor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= urban_amphitheatre
          and IsGeneral
          and RandomPercent > 75

    AcquireAncillary actor chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_aged_retainer
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Loyal >= 7

    AcquireAncillary aged_retainer chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_agriculturalist
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_farming_temple
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Pagan >= 1

    AcquireAncillary agriculturalist chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_architect
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_armourer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= foundry
          and IsGeneral
          and RandomPercent > 50

    AcquireAncillary armourer chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_artist
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_villa
          and Trait ExpensiveTastes >= 1
          and Trait BattleScarred <= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and Treasury > 2000

    AcquireAncillary artist chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_astrologer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Superstitious >= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait Christian >= 1

    AcquireAncillary astrologer chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_athlete
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stone_amphitheatre
          and IsGeneral
          and RandomPercent > 90

    AcquireAncillary athlete chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_barbarian_slave
    WhenToTest EnslavePopulation
    Condition TargetFactionCultureType barbarian

    AcquireAncillary barbarian_slave chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_barbarian_turncoat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 40
          and GeneralFoughtCulture barbarian
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary barbarian_turncoat chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_bard
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= bardic_circle
          and IsGeneral
          and RandomPercent > 50

    AcquireAncillary bard chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_beastmaster
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_hunting_temple
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary beastmaster chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_biographer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait GoodAttacker >= 1
          and Attribute Command >= 6
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary biographer chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_body_slave
    WhenToTest EnslavePopulation
    Condition not TargetFactionCultureType barbarian
          and not TargetFactionCultureType nomad
          and not TargetFactionCultureType hun 

    AcquireAncillary body_slave chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_bodyguard
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition Trait HighPersonalSecurity >= 1
          and Attribute Command >= 3
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary bodyguard chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_brilliant_inventor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= foundry
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mines+1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary brilliant_inventor chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_cackling_crone
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Superstitious >= 2
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Pagan >= 1

    AcquireAncillary cackling_crone chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_carnifex
    WhenToTest GovernorCityRebels
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary carnifex chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_carthaginian_turncoat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 50
          and GeneralFoughtCulture carthaginian
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary carthaginian_turncoat chance  11 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_catamite
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and not CultureType hun

    AcquireAncillary catamite chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_charioteer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = circus_maximus
          and Trait RacesFanRomanVice >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary charioteer chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_chief_eunuch
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition Trait HighPersonalSecurity >= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Girls >= 1

    AcquireAncillary chief_eunuch chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_chirugeon
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and IsGeneral
          and RandomPercent > 75

    AcquireAncillary chirugeon chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_civilized_slave
    WhenToTest EnslavePopulation
    Condition not TargetFactionCultureType barbarian
          and not TargetFactionCultureType nomad
          and not TargetFactionCultureType hun
          and not TargetFactionCultureType carthaginian

    AcquireAncillary civilized_slave chance  40 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_comedian
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= urban_amphitheatre
          and IsGeneral
          and RandomPercent > 85

    AcquireAncillary comedian chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_cook
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= dockyard
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianPoverty >= 1
          and RandomPercent > 75

    AcquireAncillary cook chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_courtesan
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= imperial_palace
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral
          and Trait GoodSpy >= 4
          and Treasury > 1000

    AcquireAncillary courtesan chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_crooked_judge
    WhenToTest GovernorCityRiots
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= secret_police_hq
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Management < 3

    AcquireAncillary crooked_judge chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_dancer2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= bardic_circle
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral
          and RandomPercent > 66

    AcquireAncillary dancer2 chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_decorated_hero
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageOfArmyKilled > 30
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 35
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary decorated_hero chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_desert_scout
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= cavalry_barracks
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= caravan
          and IsGeneral
          and CultureType eastern

    AcquireAncillary desert_scout chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_doctor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary doctor chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_drillmaster
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory infantry
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary drillmaster chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_drinking_companion
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = tavern
          and Trait Drink >= 2
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary drinking_companion chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_druid
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_battleforge_temple
          and Trait Pagan >= 1
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType celts

    AcquireAncillary druid chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_drunken_uncle
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Drink >= 3
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern

    AcquireAncillary drunken_uncle chance  88 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_easterner_turncoat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 40
          and GeneralFoughtCulture eastern
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary easterner_turncoat chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_elder_senator
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= curia
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary elder_senator chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_elderly_spinster_aunt
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsFactionHeir
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command <= 2

    AcquireAncillary elderly_spinster_aunt chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_equestrian
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsFactionLeader
          and RemainingMPPercentage > 50 
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= baths 
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary equestrian chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_evil_mother-in-law
    WhenToTest CharacterMarries
    Condition Trait Gambling >= 1
          and Trait Drink >= 2
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command <= 5

    AcquireAncillary evil_mother-in-law chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_exotic_slave
    WhenToTest EnslavePopulation
    Condition TargetFactionCultureType eastern

    AcquireAncillary exotic_slave chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_famous_courtesan
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait Girls >= 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and IsGeneral
          and Treasury > 5000

    AcquireAncillary famous_courtesan chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_famous_warrior
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 50
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary famous_warrior chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_fasces
    WhenToTest GovernorCityRiots
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_leadership_temple 
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait HarshJustice >= 1

    AcquireAncillary fasces chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_femme_fatale
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral 

    AcquireAncillary femme_fatale chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_floozy
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and Trait Girls >= 1
          and Trait Brave >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary floozy chance  66

    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition Trait Paranoia >= 2
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary foodtaster chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_foreign_dignitary
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition InEnemyLands
          and AgentType = diplomat
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and Attribute Influence >= 2

    AcquireAncillary foreign_dignitary chance  1

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition InEnemyLands
          and AgentType = diplomat
          and RandomPercent > 90

          and IsGeneral
          and Trait ChristianPoverty < 1
          and RandomPercent > 80

          and FatherTrait Ignorance <= 1

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = city_plumbing
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianPoverty >= 1
          and Trait Drink >= 1

    AcquireAncillary wine_steward chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_wise_man
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= governors_villa
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_leadership_shrine
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary wise_man chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_wise_woman
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_shrine 
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait Christian >= 1

    AcquireAncillary wise_woman chance  9 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_witch
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_healing_shrine 
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait Christian >= 1

    AcquireAncillary witch chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_wrestler
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= governors_palace
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= forum
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_barracks
          and IsGeneral
          and RandomPercent > 40

    AcquireAncillary wrestler chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_abbess
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists = abbey
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= curia
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary abbess chance  16 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists = abbey
          and SettlementBuildingExists <= curia
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary abbot chance  16

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary anchoress chance  2

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary bishop chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_heretic
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage >= 50
          and InUncivilisedLands
          and Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary heretic chance  16 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_heretic_nestor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and FactionType empire_east
          and I_TurnNumber >=  114 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  136 

    AcquireAncillary heretic_nestor chance  66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_heretic_pelagius
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and not FactionType empire_east
          and I_TurnNumber >=  74 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  114 

    AcquireAncillary heretic_pelagius chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_hermit
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and InUncivilisedLands
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait ChristianPoverty >= 1

    AcquireAncillary hermit chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_hun_turncoat
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 40
          and GeneralFoughtCulture hun
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary hun_turncoat chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_hun_witch
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_battle_temple 
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Pagan >= 1
          and RandomPercent > 40

    AcquireAncillary hun_witch chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_merlin
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType celts
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_battleforge_temple
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Pagan >= 1
          and IsFactionLeader
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and I_TurnNumber >=  4 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  74 

    AcquireAncillary merlin chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_Navigator2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition RemainingMPPercentage = 0
          and IsAdmiral

    AcquireAncillary Navigator2 chance  11 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= catapult_range
          and IsGeneral
          and InUncivilisedLands
          and RandomPercent > 66

    AcquireAncillary nomad_master_of_archers chance  1

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 40
          and GeneralFoughtCulture nomad
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary nomad_turncoat chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_amici_principis_east
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType empire_east
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Command >= 1
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_amici_principis_east
          and Trait Loyal >= 2
          and Attribute Influence >= 1

    AcquireAncillary office_amici_principis_east chance  55 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_amici_principis_west
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType empire_west
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Command >= 1
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_amici_principis_west
          and Trait Loyal >= 2
          and Attribute Influence >= 1

    AcquireAncillary office_amici_principis_west chance  75

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType empire_east
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = imperial_palace
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Management >= 1
          and Attribute Influence >= 1
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_comes_dispositionum_east

          and Attribute Influence >= 1

          and not Trait BadCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and not Trait GoodInfantryGeneral >= 1

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_awesome_temple
          and IsGeneral
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and Trait Zoroastrian >= 1
          and Trait Lewd <= 1
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_mobadan_mobad
          and Trait ZoroastrianPiety >= 1
          and not Attribute Command >= 3
          and Attribute Influence >= 1

    AcquireAncillary office_mobadan_mobad chance  66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_office_son_of_chinglu1
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and CultureType hun
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 51
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_son_of_chinglu1
          and Attribute Command >= 4

    AcquireAncillary office_son_of_chinglu1 chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle

          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists office_son_of_chinglu1
          and Attribute Command >= 4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_patriarch_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_basilica
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= monastary
          and FactionType empire_east
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists patriarch_1
          and SettlementName Alexandria
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary patriarch_1 chance  16 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_patriarch_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_basilica
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= monastary
          and FactionType empire_east
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists patriarch_2
          and SettlementName Antioch
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary patriarch_2 chance  22 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_basilica
          and IsGeneral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= monastary
          and FactionType empire_east
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and I_TurnNumber >= 40
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists patriarch_3
          and SettlementName Constantinople
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary patriarch_3 chance  10

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Christian >= 1

          and IsGeneral

          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists patriarch_4

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_pet_monkey2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market
          and not IsGeneral
          and not AgentType = family
          and not AgentType = diplomat
          and not AgentType = admiral
          and InEnemyLands
          and Trait GoodSpy >= 3

    AcquireAncillary pet_monkey2 chance  16 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_leadership_large_temple
          and Trait Pagan >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest1 chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_priest2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_mithras_large_temple
          and Trait Pagan >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary priest2 chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_relic_christian_martyr
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= urban_amphitheatre
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and CultureType roman
          and RandomPercent > 90
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists relic_christian_martyr
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary relic_christian_martyr chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_relic_st_polycarp
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= urban_amphitheatre
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and CultureType roman
          and RandomPercent > 85
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists relic_st_polycarp
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary relic_st_polycarp chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_relic_true_cross_nail_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists relic_true_cross_nail_1
          and RandomPercent > 66
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary relic_true_cross_nail_1 chance  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists relic_true_cross_nail_2
          and RandomPercent > 66
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists relic_true_cross_splinters_1
          and RandomPercent > 77
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary relic_true_cross_splinters_1 chance  1

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands

          and RandomPercent > 77
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists relic_true_cross_splinters_3
          and RandomPercent > 77
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary relic_true_cross_splinters_3 chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_roman_turncoat_east
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 50
          and GeneralFoughtFaction empire_east
          and FactionType empire_west
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary roman_turncoat_east chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_roman_turncoat_west
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 50
          and GeneralFoughtFaction empire_west
          and FactionType empire_east
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary roman_turncoat_west chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_saint_ambrose
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and I_TurnNumber >=  0 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  68 

    AcquireAncillary saint_ambrose chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_saint_atticus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and FactionType empire_east
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and I_TurnNumber >=  74 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  124 

    AcquireAncillary saint_atticus chance  12 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and CultureType roman
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and I_TurnNumber >=  64 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  134 

    AcquireAncillary saint_augustine_of_hippo chance  10

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and FactionType empire_east
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and I_TurnNumber >=  154 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  260 

    AcquireAncillary saint_daniel_the_stylite chance  10

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

          and SettlementBuildingExists >= monastary
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and FactionType empire_east
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and I_TurnNumber >=  70 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  88

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= monastary
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1

          and I_TurnNumber >=  194 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  274

          and I_TurnNumber <=  90

          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_cathedral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and IsGeneral
          and not Trait ChristianDisillusion >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands
          and FactionType empire_east
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and I_TurnNumber >=  114 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  192 

    AcquireAncillary saint_simeon_stylites chance  11 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_spear_of_longinus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage > 50
          and Trait ChristianProselytism >= 1
          and FactionType empire_east
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists spear_of_longinus
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and not InUncivilisedLands

    AcquireAncillary spear_of_longinus chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_spear_of_wotan
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and FactionType saxons
          and not InEnemyLands
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists spear_of_wotan
          and Trait Pagan >= 1
          and Trait PaganConversion >= 1

    AcquireAncillary spear_of_wotan chance  12 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_sword_in_the_stone
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition FactionType romano_british
          and IsFactionHeir
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 2
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and Trait ReligiousMania >= 1
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and I_TurnNumber >=  94 
          and I_TurnNumber <=  226 

    AcquireAncillary sword_in_the_stone chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_sword_of_chinglu
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and FactionType huns
          and not WorldwideAncillaryExists sword_of_chinglu
          and Trait Pagan >= 1
          and Trait HunnicFearsomeness >= 4

    AcquireAncillary sword_of_chinglu chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_veteran_warrior2
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and Attribute Command >= 4
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary veteran_warrior2 chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trigger_zoroastrian_teacher
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Zoroastrian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_large_temple
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary zoroastrian_teacher chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Zoroastrian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_large_temple
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary zoroastrian_teacher2 chance  3

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Zoroastrian >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_one_god_large_temple
          and IsGeneral
